message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to me is at least $15000. Let me know if you're interested!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this unique item. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $16500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $17000. This is a fair price considering its value to me, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this unique item. Let me know if this is something you'd like to accept.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually agreeable price. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16250. This is my final offer, and I hope it meets your budget. Let me know if this is something you'd like to accept.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in adjusting the price. Based on my budget considerations, I would like to propose a final offer of $16000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your valuation of the item.
